function_description: Filter cards by labels and create/edit labels
initial_state: User is logged into the web app and viewing a specific board on the project dashboard.
steps: Locate the settings bar on the board.
Click on the label text to view existing labels.
Select a label to filter cards or click 'Create/Edit labels' to modify labels.
If creating/editing, input new label details and save changes.
expected_state: Cards are filtered by the selected label. New or edited labels are updated and displayed in the settings bar.
